text:
Jerry John Rawlings (22 June 1947 – 12 November 2020) was a Ghanaian politician and military official. He served as the 1st President of the Fourth Republic Ghana serving from 1993 to 2001.
Rawlings died at a hospital in Accra on 12 November 2020 from COVID-19, aged 73.

annotations.surface_form: President of the Fourth Republic Ghana
